overview: Hot-selling artist Sosuke Natsume suddenly declares filmmaking on the final day of his concert. Although the staff at his music agency are panicking because of his sudden declaration, Natsume keeps preparing for it with the help of his old friend, cameraman Tamura. The film production finally starts after the staff agreed to his declaration.  However, many obstacles, such as the severe public eyes on "cross-industry filmmakers," stand one after another in front of him...
title: The Green City
